thread.title: MTV EMAs 2015: Everything you need to know about Ed Sheeran's co-host, Ruby Rose
thread.title_full: MTV EMAs 2015: Everything you need to know about Ed Sheeran's co-host, Ruby Rose

title: MTV EMAs 2015: Everything you need to know about Ed Sheeran's co-host, Ruby Rose
text:
MTV EMAs 2015: Everything you need to know about Ed Sheeran's co-host, Ruby Rose MTV EMAs 2015: Everything you need to know about Ed Sheeran's co-host, Ruby Rose Share 
Ruby Rose is Ed Sheeran’s co-hostess with the most-est at the 2015 MTV EMA awards. So excited to be hosting the MTV EMAS In Milan with Mr @edsheeran !!! See you there!! pic.twitter.com/wwsDEj7E8E 
— Ruby Rose (@RubyRose) September 30, 2015 
So, we decided to round up everything you need to know about Ed’s lovely co-host. 
1. Her full name is Ruby Rose Langenheim. She rose to fame as a VJ on MTV Australia. She’s a lady of many talents though and is also a successful actress, model… MTV EMAs host… Ruby in 2014 (Richard Shotwell/Invision/AP) 
2. You may recognise her as Orange Is The New Black’s Stella Carlin. 
— Ruby Rose (@RubyRose) June 18, 2015 
3. She’s starring alongside Milla Jovovich in the next instalment of Resident Evil. Birds flying high, you know how I feel… @MillaJovovich and I just another day in the office photo by @TheRealAliL pic.twitter.com/4UOSJTlBsY 
— Ruby Rose (@RubyRose) October 7, 2015 
4. She loves Ms Dynamite. My seriously favorite artist @Ms_Dynamite I've been in love with her music since I was 12. She's so badass. I cant! pic.twitter.com/IqNb8FsGzU 
— Ruby Rose (@RubyRose) August 1, 2015 
5. She could make Taylor Swift’s squad. Just saying. Ms Swift follows her on Twitter and everything… I'm very happy today! My future best friend followed me. pic.twitter.com/VNu3uIwBql 
— Ruby Rose (@RubyRose) June 19, 2015 
6. She’s engaged to Roald Dahl’s granddaughter, fashion designer Phoebe, who told Hello! Fashion Monthly recently she didn’t believe in love at first sight until she met Ruby. Nice little shout off for Tony Abbot in this month's Diva magazine pic.twitter.com/6kNOPk6g2W 
— Ruby Rose (@RubyRose) August 15, 2014 
7. She loves animals and posts cute photos of them. Im in an animal sandwich. pic.twitter.com/MOy1TBFEGC Share article 
— Ruby Rose (@RubyRose) August 6, 2014 Promoted Stories
